## SERVICES DESCRIPTION

The Business Adviser provides the foreign Companies / Organizations, the following services:

• Describe the economic, regulatory, geostrategic and political environment.\
• Detail the internal organizations and key decision-making processes of potential customers and relevant key public institutions.\
• Identify strategic opportunities, taking into account our customer's vision.\
• Assess the presence, strengths and weaknesses of our customers competitors.\
• Upon request, assist in the organization of contacts with public authorities/institutions, state or private institutions (e.g., export credit agency), state or private companies (e.g., banks, investors, industrial companies).\
• Facilitating/ assisting foreign Companies/Organizations to participate in several Tenders launched by the Cyprus Government.
